channel.title: Items not showing in my shop after adding them? This is new topic
channel.description:
im using the Project warfare source and client (317) i downloaded a few days ago. The shop that is highlighted in photo used to be the lottery store, i changed it to the Barrows Shop and put all barrows items in it. When i compile and run the server, i trade granpa jack and it bring up barrows shop but no items show up on it even though there in the shops.cfg file. Please help me, im new to all this and im just editing this server to my style.
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2wfstn5.jpg[/img]

item.title: Items not showing in my shop after adding them? This is new topic
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Christmas_tree, post:4, topic:477435”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=595628.msg4193789#msg4193789 date=1357208169]
Edit the N.P.C. First-Click Packet to open up your corrected Shop I.D.

Rough example:

     if (NPC_CLICK_FIRST == NPCID#) {
           raiseShop = SHOPID#;
     }

[/quote]

But if it’s displaying the correct shop name, that would imply that this was done correctly.[/quote]

Indeed, you’re correct. I didn’t read that bit of the post.

@OP When you right-click where they should be does it bring up the context menu with the Item?

Read full topic
item.source: Items not showing in my shop after adding them? This is new topic

item.title: Items not showing in my shop after adding them? This is new topic
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:3, topic:477435”]Edit the N.P.C. First-Click Packet to open up your corrected Shop I.D.

Rough example:

if (NPC_CLICK_FIRST == NPCID#) { raiseShop = SHOPID#; } [/quote]

But if it’s displaying the correct shop name, that would imply that this was done correctly.

Read full topic
